Topological properties of edges

unsigned short int libgexf::Graph::_rlock_count [protected]

Number of read-locks

char libgexf::Graph::_lock_flag [protected]

Flag used for determining the lock type:.

  • 0 = unlocked
  • 1 = read locked
  • 2 = write locked
